org.dejava.component.javaee.service

Class AbstractGenericService<Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.javaee.service.AbstractGenericService<Entity>
  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - Any entity.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericService<Entity>

    public abstract class AbstractGenericService<Entity>
extends Object
implements GenericService<Entity>
    Implements the default behavior of an JPA entity EJB service.
